schema.database: select '${ENCLOSE_VALUE_SQL}' ||DatabaseName ||'${SEPARATOR_QTE_SQL}0${ENCLOSE_VALUE_SQL}${TRAIL_SQL}' FROM ( select DatabaseName, ROW_NUMBER() over (ORDER BY DatabaseName) AS rnum from DBC.DBASE )x where 1=1 {limit}
schema.table: select '${ENCLOSE_VALUE_SQL}' ||TVMName ||'${SEPARATOR_QTE_SQL}0${ENCLOSE_VALUE_SQL}${TRAIL_SQL}' FROM ( select TVMName, ROW_NUMBER() over (ORDER BY TVMName) AS rnum from DBC.TVM t inner join DBC.DBASE d on t.DatabaseId=d.DatabaseId where DatabaseName='${DATABASE}' )x where 1=1 {limit}
schema.column: select '${ENCLOSE_VALUE_SQL}' ||FieldName ||'${SEPARATOR_QTE_SQL}0${ENCLOSE_VALUE_SQL}${TRAIL_SQL}' FROM ( select FieldName, ROW_NUMBER() over (ORDER BY FieldName) AS rnum from( select distinct FieldName from DBC.TVFIELDS c inner join DBC.TVM t on c.TableId=t.TVMId inner join DBC.DBASE d on t.DatabaseId=d.DatabaseId where DatabaseName='${DATABASE}' and TVMName='${TABLE}' )x )x where 1=1 {limit}
